TopicTitle: Is there a mod that allowes to change paint job on your ship?

Articles.Content: I always wanted to change boring stock paintjob on my space station. But can we have a mod to switch between steel like paintjob, white one, more grey or ablator plates on mk1/2 pod or mk2 cockpit. That will be so great! Just imagine you are launching a station module shining with bright steel cover Or a shuttle with a covered nose/bottom?

There is mod with switchable texture but it will change texture only for one part, not the whole vessel, Procedural Part is one of them.

There is also KerbPaint to directly paint over your rocket, check the last page of the thread for a working version.
